item.title: Huge Error
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

[quote=“owner Ethan, post:11, topic:146486”][quote author=Lank O link=topic=200516.msg1781587#msg1781587 date=1190795223]
owner, i don’t mean to burst your bubble, but proper grammar is a rule here.

im pretty sure that you have to restart your server when you ip ban someone.
[/quote] actually, id hate to burst YOUR BUBBLE i was using “proper” grammer[/quote]

Sorry to burst your bubble, but the way I type is proper grammar. You are using noob talk. I can’t even type like you without wanting to fix it or hurt myself. It is a disgrace if you think that “unless his tryna fuck wit u” is proper grammar. Proper grammar involves Capitalization, Punctuation, and Spelling correctly used. You obviously can’t comprehend that so I am going to stop now.

Read full topic

what if you cant answer please dont post…that isnt helpful at all[/quote]

that is helpfull its telling you, your ip ban sucks
